description:
Even if you’re not headed to the Alaskan capital, you can rest easy knowing your noggin will be nice and toasty. Made from fine acrylic yarn that traps in warmth, the Juneau beanie has a classic style and timeless coziness.

  • Soft acrylic yarn wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Cuff adds an extra later on insulation where you need it most
name: Outdoor Research Juneau Beanie - Unisex
